title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area
name: Malibu Canyon Trail
address: 5 mile round-trip to the M*A*S*H filming location.
content: A short, moderately strenuous hike through Malibu Creek State Park, skirting Century Lake. The remains of the filming location and sets from the classic television program M*A*S*H can still be seen today, slowly being reclaimed by the elements.
